title: Rent Configuration
description: Config file relating to assumptions about rent.

monthly_rent.description: Monthly rent for the first month.

monthly_utilities.description: Monthly utilities for the first month.

monthly_renters_insurance.description: Monthly renters insurance for the first month.

annual_rent_inflation_rate.description: ANNUAL rent inflation rate as a fraction. This will be applied to all rent-related expenses (e.g., rent, utilities, parking).

inflation_adjustment_period.description: How often, in months, to update rent-related expenses for inflation. Twelve is a good number here, as leases are often for 12-month periods and rents change when leases end.
